newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-So Minn hogs estimate Friday 95,000 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-So Minn hogs estimate Friday 95,000 - USDA.

text.p: Estimated interior Iowa/southern Minnesota hog receipts Friday were 95,000 head, compared with 98,000 a week ago and 99,000 a year ago. Saturday's estimate was 15,000 head, compared with 14,000 a week ago and 20,000 a year ago.
Estimates include generally about 65 percent Carcass Base Hogs. Barrows and gilts $0.50 lower than midsession Thursday. Trade slow for light to moderate demand and light offerings.

Compared to last week: Barrows and Gilts 1.50 lower. Sows steady to 1.00 lower. Receipts this week 493,000 last week 512,000, last year 507,000. Barrows and Gilts average weight for week ending May 17, 1997 254.4 lbs compared to 254.4 lbs previous week 249.1 lbs last year.
